name: Mystical Lake
description:
Game rules

A mystical lake has appeared which gives amazing rewards when you fish up items from it!

Try to last for as long as possible and salvage as much money as you can to beat your highscore.

Every turn you draw a hand of 3 items from your deck and lose 1 food. It's game over if you run out of food. Your maximum food at any time is 10.

When you use an item you get spoils from the lake which are added to your deck. The item you just used are discarded.

When the lake is out of spoils, all used items are reshuffled back into the lake along with some additional trash cards and the game then continues.

Based on a simple game idea I had when I was like 7 or something.

Cool sprites and icons provided by https://game-icons.net
